Body:
"""
        Check that minimum child node size causes the tree to
        terminate correctly
        """
tree = CHAID.Tree.from_numpy(self.ndarr, self.arr, alpha_merge=0.999,
    weights=self.wt, max_depth=5, min_child_node_size=10.7)
assert len(tree.tree_store) == 4
assert round(tree.tree_store[0].split.p, 5) == 0.08781
